text: Kapena (jwambone ni) Ajula jwaagumbile mawunde ni mataka, ni kuntuluchisya kuumila kwinani mesi (gawula), ni tumesisye ni galakwego matimbe gana uŵigo gagakwete kusalalila? Nganiuŵa kukwenu (ukombosi) wanti nikumesya itela yakwe. Ana pana nnungu jwine pampepe ni Allah? (Ngwamba!) Nambo ŵanganyao niŵandu ŵaakuŵika chakulandanyichisya (ni Jwalakwe pakuchigalagatila)
